name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As we approach the 35th anniversary of the Tiananmen Incident, we will discuss human rights in China with @hrichina and Humane China
@HChina89 collaborates to release a series of June 4th thematic pictures
Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 10 (May 22)
[Political deadlock, many senior officials said they sympathized with the students] [Chinese people around the world rose up to protest against the CCP]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 22, Gansu. China Railway 21st Bureau owed workers wages, and the workers held up banners to demand their wages. Later, some workers received a private message from someone claiming to be from the company's project department, saying that the county leaders asked them to delete the video of holding the banner.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on May 22, recently, a chart of the birth population reported by Chengnan Street, Tianxin District, Changsha City in the first quarter of 2024 was circulated on the Internet. The chart shows that in the first quarter of 2024, the street reported only 17 births, including 11 first-born children, 5 second-born children, and 1 third-born child.
Interface News verified on the website of the Tianxin District People's Government of Changsha City that the content of the chart is true.
But as of now, the data has been 404.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 21, multiple sources reported that JD Retail began to strictly check attendance this week and adjusted the lunch break rules. The new rules require that the number of people working at work be counted at 9 a.m. every day, and if the shuttle bus is late, a certificate must be submitted; the lunch break time is shortened to 1 hour, from 12:00 to 13:00, and the lights must not be turned off during this period. In addition, the company strictly prohibits the use of clocking in for others, and once discovered, the relevant personnel will be severely punished. In order to assess the work saturation of employees, employees who leave work at 6 p.m. must

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we have collaborated with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humane China @HChina89 to release a series of special pictures on June 4th.
The 11th scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement (May 23)
[Earth-shaking Painted Egg, Dirty Hair Statue] [Seven Generals Opposing Martial Law, Public Letter]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 20, Xi'an Binjiang Emerald City.
Because the promised famous schools, wetland parks, smart rails, and subways were not delivered, and there was a risk of unfinished projects.
On that day, the owners went to Xixian Building to defend their rights. During the period, several parents were arrested by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 23, Dongguan, Guangdong. A man on Humen Avenue in Humen Town held a knife to his neck and confronted the police, but was later subdued by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At about 7:00 on May 23, a residential building in Xiangshun Community, Harbin, Heilongjiang Province, suddenly exploded. According to reports, the accident has caused one death and three other injured people are being treated in the hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 23, the PLA Eastern Theater Command conducted the "Joint Sword-2024A" exercise around Taiwan Island.
On the same day, the Eastern Theater Command released a combination poster "Cross-Sea Killer", showing China's new fighter jets, main destroyers, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiyuan netizens said that there have been a series of suicides by jumping off bridges in the area in recent days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comments section of the series of suicides by jumping off bridges in Taiyuan, people lamented that life is not easy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 22, owners of Wuyi Oasis Community in Jiangning, Nanjing, said that the subdistrict office used 16 million yuan of owners' maintenance funds to carry out fire protection renovations without notifying the owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Tianjin Zhuyuan Health Technology Group carried out direct sales business of Yongbeida Mall in various parts of Hubei by registering branches, but it eventually collapsed.
Starting from the 18th, investors went to Tianjin to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 23rd, a fresh graduate of JD.com was fired by the company just 12 days after becoming a regular employee because he commented on the recent strict attendance inspection on the intranet, "When will it be acquired by PDD?"
According to blogger "Brother Leopard", JD.com Retail has begun to check employees' mobile phones to see if they have participated in discussions on Maimai about this matter. If they refuse to check, they will be fired.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of May 22, Shenzhen, Guangdong. The property management of Guifangyuan Community did not allow electric vehicles to enter, which caused dissatisfaction among residents and food delivery riders. Many people honked their horns outside the door to protest.
In the end, the property management compromised and everyone successfully entered the community.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 23, after the PLA Eastern Theater announced a military exercise around Taiwan, the A-share market fell 1.33%, while the Taiwan stock market rose 0.26%, sparking dissatisfaction among investors including Hu Xijin. Hu even angrily criticized the A-share market for almost never performing well at important points, and the reasons for its decline are more than the words we can find to criticize it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, workers of liquefied gas delivery in Changsha, Hunan Province, went on strike, resulting in many businesses having no gas available.
According to a local gas delivery worker, workers previously made a profit of about 20 yuan per order, but recently a new gas company moved in, reducing the profit to 11 yuan per order, so the workers went on strike, resulting in many businesses complaining about having no gas available.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 23, many domestic maps showed routes for driving across the sea to Taiwan. On the page, there was a dotted line showing "Cross-sea Bridge (under construction)"
